ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 186
ygData.msgSnippet: clear up a quick misconception real quick. The one people were getting banned for was NOT SHOWEQ this one runs on linux and is for all purposes . COMPLETELY
ygData.messageBody:
clear up a quick misconception real quick.

The one people were getting banned for was NOT SHOWEQ this one runs on linux and
is for all purposes .

COMPLETELY UNSEEN BY EQ. unless you are a braggart in game like i know one
person was.



The one that everone was getting busted over is/was a 3rd party calling it
showeq for windows (its now defunt i think).

There is a diffrence



And yes i know not because i run them (i did run the windows for a to check it
out) but that thing was as much a pain to use and monitor if not worse
than camping.

AND GOD I HATE CAMPING...was fun to see everythings level and stuff but hey its
got 32000 HP i knew i couldnt kill it before then.....



The windows version is what got Verant to changing the encryption like ever 3
days, just too many people could use it.

The linux version, well some people are still gonna use it. but they cant see it
and id guess about 95%+'s not gonna have a clue on how to even install it.



The real problem with this is not they can see special spawns, but on PVP
servers.....this is but one reason i wont play on'em



Flame if you want, but then again i really dont care if you do, lower yourself
to those standards.

At that point i dont even bother, cant argue with Kids, the IRS, or your wife.
